alert.note: Alert for North Central; San Juan and Vicinity (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Excessive Heat Watch issued June 08 at 5:50AM ADT until June 10 at 6:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Prolonged periods of dangerously hot temperatures and high humidity possible with heat indices of 112 Fahrenheit or more. * WHERE...along the urban and coastal areas of northern Puerto Rico from Carolina to Arecibo. * WHEN...For the Excessive Heat Warning, through 5 PM AST this afternoon. For the Excessive Heat Watch, through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...The combination of hot temperatures and high humidity will create dangerous situations in which heat related illnesses are possible.
info.instruction: Take extra precautions, if you work or spend time outside. When possible, reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear light weight and loose fitting clothing when possible and drink plenty of water. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. This is especially true during warm or hot weather when car interiors can reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes.

area.areaDesc: North Central; San Juan and Vicinity
